            title="Optional">
        <span>Catalog<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ID of the Glue Catalog to create the database in. If omitted, this defaults to the AWS Account ID.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Description</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Description of the database.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Location<wbr>Uri</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The location of the database (for example, an HDFS path).
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The name of the database.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Parameters</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A list of key-value pairs that define parameters and properties of the database.
</dd>

</dl>
